channel.title: South Devon Sound - Broadcast Schedule
channel.description: We play the best music from yesterday and today- all day, every day. On South Devon Sound you'll find a show to match virtually all of your moods.

item.title: Let Philshine usher in a fantastic new year as he brings you all the best music of the 70s, 80s, 90s and today- only on South Devon Sound!
Get ready now for some fun, laughter, and the best songs that children's entertainment has to offer in KidsZone- on the air now until 10am!
South Devon Saturday on the air until 1pm with the soundtrack to your weekend- why not check out the games on our website while you listen?
Tune in now to Everything Eighties and reminisce on years gone by with some classic tunes of the era here on South Devon Sound!
Dust off that air guitar and rock out to your first weekend of the year with the Saturday Afternoon Radio Show- on the air now until 5pm!
Celebrate the new year by travelling to the birthplace of man with Africa Calling on South Devon Sound- you'll be back at home by 7pm! ;-)
South Devon Saturday back with you now until 11pm- Why not drop us a comment to let us know how 2011 has been treating you so far?
Drift off now to the calming sounds of South Devon by Night here on South Devon Sound and dream of all that awaits you in the year ahead!
Have you voted for your favourite South Devon Sound morning and afternoon shows yet? If not, visit the website and take part now!
Philshine is back again for another edition of his weekend breakfast show- bringing you some of the best music around in his unique style.
South Devon Sunday on the air now until 1pm with the soundtrack to your South Devon weekend- only here on South Devon Sound!
The old songs get an outing as we put some remakes through their paces in Classic Remakes until 3pm. Up next: The Sunday 70s Show!
Join us now for the first Sunday 70s Show of the year as we take you back in time to the flamboyant and lively music of the 70s.
Country music at it's finest here on South Devon Sound now as Gone Country takes over for the next 2 hours- Stetsons and boots are optional...
All the best songs of stage and screen now on the air as we take our seats for another Musical Memories here on South Devon Sound.
Celebrate the end of your romantic New Year weekend by joining us in The Love Zone for the best and most powerful love songs ever!
South Devon by Night here now to ease you into a blissful sleep in preparation for the week ahead; we'll be back from 6am tomorrow.
Start your week the Devon way with Dave on Good Morning South Devon until 9am as he brings you the best music from yesterday and today!
Tune in now to South Devon at Work and Play- the soundtrack to your life in the South West- here with you until 11pm tonight!
Drift away with South Devon Sound now as South Devon by Night eases the stresses and strains of a long and tiring Monday.
Join Dave again for another Good Morning South Devon until 9am as he brings you the best music from the 70s, 80s, 90s and today!
South Devon at Work and Play with you now for the rest of your working day- playing some of the best music around.
Chill out now to the smooth grooves and calming sounds of South Devon by Night- here with you until 6am tomorrow.
Dave is back again with another edition of South Devon Sound- on the air now until 9am. Tune in and get started on the week ahead!
Join us now for South Devon at Work and Play- the sound track to your South Devon working day; only here on South Devon Sound!
South Devon by Night on the air now with a selection of easy listening classics, Jazz, and mellow tunes to help you drift off to sleep.
